Producer: Christophe Bruncher, Vesela Kazakova, Mina Mileva
Screenwriter: Bilyana Kazakova, Mina Mileva, Vesela Kazakova
Production Co: Activist38, arte France Cinéma, Ici et Là Productions
Synopsis: A mother stork is shot down from a chimney. A woman suffering from postnatal depression nearly jumps off a balcony. A girl has to deal with the stigma of HIV. A mother looks for magic in the lunar calendar. Fragility and absurdity in this contemporary Bulgarian family are set against the backdrop of violent anti gender-equality protests. Based on a true story.
Title: Women Do Cry
